name: Fly Away (itch) (Skylar, Ami C, PotatoC, Ruofu Sun)
name_original: Fly Away (itch) (Skylar, Ami C, PotatoC, Ruofu Sun)
description:
Use"←""→" to move /  SPACE for jump

As a cartoonist, one day you accidentally find some small sketches you drew in your notebook as a child.

You look at it and smile - since you know the caterpillar chasing the butterfly has long since turned into one.

A game by:

Art & Animation: Ami Cai & Yining Li 

Programming: Ruofu Sun

Sound & Music: Skylar Ai

Thank you for playing!
